title: Website Starter — Basic
description: A fast, responsive 5-page brochure website built with modern React and Tailwind. Includes basic SEO, mobile optimization, and deployment guidance.

title: Website Pro — E-commerce Ready
description: Professional website with product pages, shopping cart setup, performance optimizations, and analytics. Ideal for small businesses looking to sell online.

title: SEO Audit — Essentials
description: Technical SEO audit covering core vitals, indexability, and on-page recommendations with a 10-point action plan.

title: SEO Growth Package
description: Monthly SEO package including keyword research, content guidance, link auditing, and monthly reporting to grow organic traffic.

title: Cybersecurity Audit — Essentials
description: We perform an external security scan, configuration review, and provide prioritized remediation steps to harden your stack.

title: IT Support — Monthly
description: Managed remote IT support for small teams including 10 support hours per month, patching guidance, and priority response.

title: Software Optimization License
description: License for our performance optimization tool — includes one year of updates and priority support.

title: Training: Python Basics (Group)
description: Two-hour live workshop introducing Python fundamentals for non-developers and beginners.
